argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpbn0.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grplid.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grplid.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mndlid | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ X e. B ) -> ( .0. .+ X ) = X ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( .0. .+ X ) = X ) |
